Table 39. Personal crimes of violence, 2005:  Percent distribution of single-offender victimizations, by type of crime and perceived age of offender
Note: Detail may not add to total shown because of rounding.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Includes verbal threats of rape and threats of sexual assault.
